page.title: 05Nursing, Swanton Morley 1
page.content:
The District Nurse is Nurse Martin,who has lived in the area for 21 years. She is mainly a midwife nurse. She is attached to a G.P. at North Elmham, from whom she gets her patients.
She is paired with another nurse. Her territory covers 39 villages and she travels about 900 miles a month. She provides her own car, but is allowed a petrol allowance of 21.9 p a mile. She is given a uniform and badge, but provides her own shoes and stockings. She always has her medical bag and is provided with equipment.
She works 10 days on, then 4 days off, being on duty 24 hours a day.
